definitions.definition: ( countable , slightly dated ) Clipping of discotheque ( “ nightclub for dancing ” ) .
( uncountable , music ) A genre of dance music that was popular in the 1970s , characterized by elements of soul music with a strong Latin-American beat and often accompanied by pulsating lights.
( British ) A dance , a social gathering where dancing is the main activity.

main_definition: ( countable , slightly dated ) Clipping of discotheque ( “ nightclub for dancing ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , music ) A genre of dance music that was popular in the 1970s , characterized by elements of soul music with a strong Latin-American beat and often accompanied by pulsating lights.
( British ) A dance , a social gathering where dancing is the main activity.

definitions.definition: discovery (pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered)
examples: You don't need to worry about these details at the complaint stage, we can get them in disco .

definitions.definition: discovery (materials revealed to the opposing party during the pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered)
examples: Has the disco come in from the defendants yet? We sent them requests almost six weeks ago.

main_definition: ( US , law , informal ) discovery (pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered)
secondary_definitions: ( US , law , informal ) discovery (materials revealed to the opposing party during the pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered)
